name: AffiliationId
description: PRIMARY KEY: Unique Identifier for an Organisation

name: Rank
description: The static rank roughly reflects the log probability of an entity being 'important' - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/academic-services/graph/resources-faq#what-is-the-rank-value-on-entities

name: DisplayName
description: The Displayed name of the Organisation

name: GridId
description: The Grid ID of the Organisation

name: OfficialPage
description: The URL of the Organisations Offical Website

name: WikiPage
description: The URL of the Wikipedia entry of the Organisation

name: PaperCount
description: The number of Papers that have been identified to have authors from this Organisation

name: PaperFamilyCount
description: Same as PaperCount with the following provisions - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/academic-services/graph/resources-faq#papercount-vs-paperfamilycount

name: CitationCount
description: The sum of citations for Papers that have been linked to this Organisation

name: Iso3166Code
description: Two-letter codes (alpha-2) defined in ISO_3166 Code (ISO.org) and ISO 3166-2 (Wiki). Example: US

name: CreatedDate
description: The date in which this record was first created
